TopicTitle: Regular keybindings not disabled when entering text when planting flag.

Articles.Content: When typing text in the description panel of a flag, comma and period still have their regular function, adjusting time-warp and pausing/unpausing the game. Other key-bindings might also still be active; I didn't check, I just noticed the time-warp because of the resulting pop-up.
Reported elsewhere in relation to typing in vessel name or save file name.  Seems to be an issue where no text boxes block keyboard inputs from other functions.
This has been fixed as of v0.1.3.
